title: Azir soldier attacking the air
body: After an Azir soldier finishes attacking, sometimes it will sit there and continue to do the attack animation when you're not controlling it

replies.body: They're probably attacking annoying little bugs!
You can't blame them, they don't have eyes.
Heimerdinger turrets do the same thing
I thought I was the only one this is definitely the most annoying bug atm besides ashe's ult
Can confirm. Also, the attack animation does not do any damage.

This has been a bug for a while, just not many play azir so no one has noticed. People are always surprised when my soldiers derp out in games. The soldiers also still have that bug where occasionally the soldier won't attack after you use your q. This can happen even if you wait a second before you input the attack command. It makes the attack sound effect but no animation or damage. But yeah, azir seems to need to brush up on his leadership abilities.

I've been playing Azir occasionally since the end of last season, but this has been happening since the last patch introducing the Ashe rework(5.9), maybe the patch before that, but I didn't see it happen then.
I have had it happen since at least 5.8.
I was playing azir the other day and it would not let me attack the cs wave. The soldiers just kept attacking the air. I had to wait till they disappeared before I could attack.

Really, I don't know why riot hasn't adressed these kind of bugs. Like, I've seen it several times in the proplays, even more than twice in a game. Just because Azir is strong or still wins games, it doesn't mean that he can stay buggy.
What about when the solider attacks with animation but no damage has gone through bug?
Also sometimes the soldiers just move weird when you use your Q, they are turning back to you instead of attacking the target.
This is definitely going on  please fix it
Fingers crossed they fix it, nowhere near gamebreaking but it hurts my eyes
